RelatedSentence: It is now going to have a medical college .
Finance minister Nitin Patel will lay the foundation stone for the medical college at a ceremony near Arjun Bari Darwaza in Vadnagar on Tuesday .
Officials said land had been acquired for the college sometime back and now the building for the medical college will be constructed .
Sources said the medical college and hospital will cost Rs 118 crore .
Vadnagar has a referral hospital which will be upgraded simultaneously into a state - of - the - art 250 - bed hospital even as the college building is being constructed .
The medical college will be attached to a 150 - bed hospital , said an official .
Maninagar ( in Ahmedabad ) , Modi 's assembly constituency for the past 12 years , also has a medical college .
Vadnagar residents say the medical college in their town will be Modi 's biggest gift to his hometown .
In 2004 , as CM he approved CBSE Navoday Vidyamandir .
The town has three government primary and secondary schools and one English - medium private school .
In this college , 400 students pursue undergraduate studies in pure sciences .

A1: diploma courses in mechanical , IT , and Electronics and
RelatedSentence: This college offers diploma courses in mechanical , IT , and Electronics and Communication Engineering .
Now children of even poor parents are able to afford higher education , said Sunil Mehta , president of the Vadnagar municipality .
